TopicTitle: Rapidly Overestimating Escalation of Delta V?

Articles.Content: I noticed as of recently that when I guesstimate the amount of DV needed to get somewhere my dV-budget tends to escalate like a row of dominoes, it just goes larger and larger as I construct the rocket, ending up with several thousands extra dV that I don't really need. Anyone noticed anything similar?
Not really. I generally stop building once I've met my delta-V budget plus some safety margin.
